availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Birth: c1832 in Oldham County, Kentucky
Death: May 24, 1893 in Carrollton, Carroll County, Kentucky
Residence: LaGrange, Oldham County, KY (in 1860); Carroll County, KY (in 1863 and 1870)

Biography: Married Virginia E. Wilson in Oldham County, KY on September 9, 1858. Occupation: Farmer (in 1860 census), physician (on May 1863 U.S. IRS Tax Assessment List and in 1870 census). Not listed on 1850 or 1860 slaveholder census schedules.

bibl.p:
Eight Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules,
Kentucky, Oldham County, p. 851.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules,
Kentucky, Carroll County, p. 18.
